MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G53 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Linthaugh Road and surrounding areas . We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.01am. Our engineers are on their way to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.15pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.18am on  Tuesday 29th December 2020
